Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Lu Meihe, the art team leader who is called "Cobra" by her subordinates, is a person with a strict appearance and a pure heart. She has a crush on Lin Wenjing, an intern in the group, but due to her image and personality, she cannot express her friendship naturally, so she can only pin her emotions on the sketchbook she carries with her. In an accident, the secret of the sketchbook was discovered by the person concerned. Only then did Lu Meihe know that Lin Wenjing, who seemed gentle and easy-going, seemed to be not a quiet queen... I was bullied by the junior again today, so happy, what should I do?
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

description.en:
[There was a pitiful girl who cried tears of diamond and lived while being abused by her family. But a prince appeared and killed off the entirety of the evil family. And so, the girl lived happily ever after with the prince.]

...is the fairy tale, but I reincarnated as the evil sister, 'Marcia Blick'?!

This damned household! I have to escape from this house now, at least! But if I run away, what about my sister who will be left behind? I've made my decision! We're going to run away together!

'Larisa. Let's go find that prince who will make you happy!'

But: "Please marry me."

Prince, why are you proposing to me? Your partner isn't me, but my sister! This sister of yours will make you a 'perfect ending plan'!

description.zh: 「很久很久以前，有一个可怜小女孩， 因为会流下钻石眼泪，而遭到家人虐待。 但是王子出现了，他帮助女孩逃离了家族。 从此两人过上了幸福快乐的日子。」 而我？竟然穿越进了这个童话中， 成为了欺负小女孩的坏姐姐！ 我决定带着妹妹逃走， 去寻找能让她幸福的王子！ 可是， “请你和我结婚吧。” 王子，你为什么向我求婚了？ 你的命定之人不是我，而是我的妹妹才对啊！ 拉莉莎，你等着， 姐姐一定会让你迎来圆满的结局！
description.zh-hk:
我穿越到童話世界了？角色還是反派—主人公的姐姐馬西婭•布里克！ ！

童話內容是有位可憐的少女被家人虐待，只想要她流下的鑽石眼淚， 後來王子出現手刃惡毒的家人，從此少女和王子迎來完美結局。

這該死的家庭，我現在就要逃跑！但我跑了妹妹怎麼辦？

好！那就帶著妹妹一起逃跑！莉莉沙，我們去找能夠讓你幸福的王子吧！

“和我結婚吧”！王子，你向我求婚幹什麼？你的命定之人不是我，而是我妹妹！ ！

莉莉沙，你等著， 姐姐一定讓你迎來完美結局！

description.en: "Genius Cool Treasure: The President's Wife Is Too Powerful" is a web comic serialized by a Japanese writer. The comic tells that five years ago, in a tent with black lights, the woman drove him drunk, and gave birth to twins and lost one. Five years later, the woman filmed him secretly, healed his hidden illness, stole his heart, and took a small bun to abduct his other son to play missing. Feng Yizhen swears that she must catch the woman's fierce affection and let her know that she has to pay the price.

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

Amane who invites her neighbor living next door Sango to the sea.

description.en: Set in a fantasy world where people from another world equipped with powerful skills bring prosperity to the kingdom, soon hailed as heroes. However behind the scenes problems arise which are urging the kingdom's princess to seek the help of a certain man - a genuine hero - who is believed to stand a chance against the powerful otherworldly warriors.

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

title.en: Darling, Why Do You Regret It？

description.en: I secretly met my husband's mistress. Delicate, lovely, and sweet, her name was Saira. “I’ll never leave the Duke!” “Now, *that’s* the spirit.” “W-what?” I had reincarnated as Tareia—a noblewoman with a wealthy family, beauty, and nothing to feel inferior about in life. But there was just one obstacle in my perfect plan: “Keep seducing my husband.” I was ready to toss him aside and live a fabulous single life. ...Or so I thought. “I’m starting to find you fascinating.” “Can I call you... *Lea*?” “My lady, please, anything but divorce.” Why are these men suddenly acting like this?!

altTitles.ja: 最果てに惑う

altTitles.es-la: Perdido en los extremos más bajos

description.en: After his little sister was raped and killed herself, a teenage boy took revenge and killed her rapist in return. Seven years later the boy's released from prison, determined to kill himself due to insufferable guilt but then he's confronted by the rapist's daughter. A dramatic tale of guilt and atonement.
description.ru:
«Семь лет назад я убил человека».

Расправившись с преступником, который довёл его сестру, Юри, до самоубийства, Кадзума был приговорён к семи годам тюремного заключения. Даже после выхода на свободу его преследуют мысли о совершённом убийстве и о девочке, наблюдавшей за происходящим. Терзаемый чувством вины, Кадзума принимает решение искупить свои грехи собственной смертью. Вместе со своей матерью он навещает могилу Юри, где замечает знакомое лицо девочки...

Это история о несчастной судьбе дочери преступника-потерпевшего.
description.es-la:
Después de que su hermana pequeña Yuri fuera violada y debido a esto se suicidara, su hermano Kazuma decide tomar venganza y matar a su violador. 

7 años después, él sale de prisión, decidido a suicidarse debido a una culpa insoportable y para estar paz con su hermana, pero luego accidentalmente conoce a Shiika, la hija del violador de su hermana. Una historia dramática de culpa y expiación.

altTitles.ja: ノイパちゃんはアブナイ!

description.en: At school, no one seems to care what transfer student Noipa-chan wears. In fact, they don't even seem to notice her existence, except for one person. Yuu is the only one who wonders what's going on with that girl.
description.ja:
ねぇ、アタシのこと…見てた?

男子学生"ユウ"の前に現れた、露出全開な美少女"ノイパ"。彼女は大胆な衣装に身を包んでいるにも関わらず、日常に溶け込み、他の教師や生徒は無反応。
description.es-la: En la escuela, a nadie parece importarle la vestimenta de Noipa-chan, una estudiante transferida. De hecho, ni siquiera parecen notar su existencia, salvo por una persona. Yuu es el único que se pregunta qué sucede con esa chica, y ahora que fue descubierto mirándola, se verá inmiscuido en una situación de peligro.
description.pt-br: Na escola, ninguém parece se importar com o que a estudante transferida Noipa-chan usa. Na verdade, eles nem parecem notar a sua existência, exceto uma pessoa. Yuu é o único que se pergunta o que está acontecendo com aquela garota.

title.en: Food Truck Owner inside the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Food Truck Owner in the Dungeon

description.en:
"Don't yearn for a world different from yours, just live a normal life."

Hunters, dungeons, I'm not interested in any of them.
My life followed one single path that's of cooking.
But the moment I was about to open my first long-awaited food truck....

[Class: You have awakened as a Food Truck Owner (Hidden)!]
[Item: Dungeon Business Permit (Personal/Non-Transferable)!]
- Business is only possible inside the dungeon

Min Jiun, 21 years old, awakened as the owner of a food truck inside the dungeon.

altTitles.ja: 宅配員のおねえさんがやってきた

description.en: The story revolves around a young boy and a friendly delivery lady who regularly visits his house. Their simple, humorous interactions lead to a growing, wholesome bond as they share everyday moments.

In a deserted alley travelled by few, is an antique shop. It has no sign, no name. It sells the usual items, but if you believe the rumors, this particular shop also sells undisclosed wish-granting items—for a price, of course. And buyers who fail to follow an item's directions for use will pay an especially high price.

title.en: Urenokori no Dorei Elf o Hirotta no de, Musume ni Suru Koto ni shita

altTitles.ja: 売れ残りの奴隷エルフを拾ったので、娘にすることにした

altTitles.ja-ro: Urenokori no Dorei Elf wo Hirotta no de, Musume ni suru Koto ni shita

altTitles.en: My Daughter was an Unsold Slave Elf.

altTitles.vi: Con gái tôi là tiên tộc bán ế

description.en:
Weiss, a magician living in the scoundrel-filled Zenith, finds a high elf girl for sale, a higher level elf species that is said to be extinct.

He decides to buy her and raise her as his daughter. The high elf doesn't even know how to speak the language, but Weiss' hard work in raising her seems to be paying off...? 

A warm and fluffy fantasy featuring the rookie dad Weiss and his cute little elven daughter!
description.ja:
絶滅したというエルフの上位種、ハイエルフの少女が売られているのを見つけたヴァイス。

購入して娘として育てることに決めた。言葉も知らないハイエルフだったがヴァイスの懸命な育児の成果がでてきて…？ 

成長が止まらないハイエルフから目が離せないっっ！

title.en: Come On Now, Even If I’m Not A Villain

description.en: After being killed by her own father, I woke up... 500 years later?! To make things worse, I’ve been reborn into the body of a so-called villainess—a woman hated by her family and fiancé for her fragile health and sharp temper. All I wanted was to live quietly and figure out why I was reincarnated. But now, my once-cold family and fiancé are suddenly desperate for my attention, and my slave boy from 500 years ago has returned... perfectly alive. As if that wasn’t enough, immortal weapons from ancient times are starting to gather around me. "You shouldn’t have fed the stray dog." I never gave anyone a single bite, so why is this happening?!

altTitles.ja: シーザス
復活殺手JESUS

description.en:
The criminal underworld speaks of a hitman bearing incredible skill...this man goes by the name "Jesus." Why, you ask? Because it happens to be last word to escape the lips of any fool unfortunate enough to be caught on the wrong end of his gun.

Internationally wanted hitman, codenamed Jesus, fakes his death using the body of his exact double, high school teacher Shingo Fujisawa. A much bigger problem is at play, as Fujisawa's family is unaware of his death (via cardiac arrest), leading to Jesus taking up the name and profession of his much more legally-sound doppelganger. When the mafia and international agents start showing up in Japan, Jesus must do everything in his power to keep his newfound family, peers, and students safe, all while his opponents pray for mercy!


----

Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **J**

title.en: Isekai ni Shoukan Saretan Dakedo, Nandemo Kireteshimau Kennou o Teni Ireta node Easy Mode Deshita.

altTitles.ja: 異世界に召喚されたんだけど、なんでも斬れてしまう権能を手に入れたのでイージーモードでした。

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai ni Shoukan Saretan Dakedo, Nandemo Kireteshimau Kennou wo Teni Ireta node Easy Mode Deshita.

altTitles.en: I Was Summoned to Another World, but I Got the Power to Cut Anything, so It Was Easy Mode.

description.en:
With the divine power known as the ability “Ripper”, unrivaled in its might!

During a class, Haruki Ito, along with all his classmates, is summoned to another world. One day after the summoning, Haruki discovers the power that has been bestowed upon him…?!
___
**Character Designer:** [Iso Kazunari](https://mangadex.org/author/e464e568-e9c2-4a93-82cd-f9507121a50d)

[Web Novel Raw](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3031gx/)
description.ja:
伊藤晴樹は授業中、クラスメイトと全員一緒に異世界に召喚されてしまう。召喚後のある日、晴樹は自身が与えられた権能にを知ることになって…!?
 
--- 
 
Itō Haruki wa jugyō-chū, kurasumeito to zen'in issho ni i sekai ni shōkan sa rete shimau. Shōkan-go no aru hi, Haruki wa jishin ga atae rareta ken'nō ni o shiru koto ni natte...!?

description.ar: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
description.en: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
description.fr: uo Tianchen est l'un des derniers survivants sur terre depuis qu'une épidémie venant de l'espace s'était abattue sur terre, il l'y a de cela 10 ans. Alors qu'il est sur le point de mourir, Zuo fît donc ses adieux à sa petite amie qu'il avait rencontré durant l'épidémie. C'est alors que, d'un coup, alors qu'il était sur le point de mourir, il retourna dans le temps 10 ans auparavant, quelques heures avant le début de l'épidémie. C'est alors qu'il décida de sauver son meilleur ami qui avait périt dès le début de l'épidémie, 10 ans auparavant, et c'est alors qu'il se met à la recherche de sa copine qu'il avait dans l'ancienne apocalypse.
description.ru:
Зе Тянчен – последний выживший человек в городе, зараженном зомби-инфекцией. Будучи на грани смерти, он внезапно оказался в своем теле десять лет назад, когда город еще не был заражен. Он решил, что в этот раз спасет близких ему людей и воссоединится со своей старой любовью.   
  
Следите за его приключениями, в которых он использует свои воспоминания о следующих 10 годах, чтобы выжить и спасти своих близких!

title.en: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.ja: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha to Yobareta Ato ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.en: After Being Called a Hero: The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family

description.en: In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord's army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd's companion!?
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。

altTitles.ja: ラブ・バレット

description.en:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
description.uk:
З початку існування людства, ті, хто ніколи не відчули кохання і зустріли неочікуваний кінець, отримували другий шанс, як Купідони, як дар від Богині Кохання.

Сьогоденні Купідони змінили свої луки і стріли на новітню зброю, але їх місія залишається такою ж: знайти підходяче кохання для їх цілей і закохати їх!

altTitles.ja: 氷菓

altTitles.th: ปริศนาความทรงจำ

description.en:
Oreki Houtarou is an "energy-saver" kind of guy, who expends as little energy as possible to do only things he has to. When he starts high school, his older sister sends him a letter asking him to join the Classics Club. The club meant a lot to her, and its number of members has been reduced to zero.  
  
Houtarou reluctantly signs up for the club, only to find that someone else has joined, too! She's Chitanda Eru, a cute, big-eyed girl with an overwhelming sense of curiosity. A mystery crops up that catches Eru's interest, and also draws in Houtarou's friend, Fukube Satoshi. They continue solving mundane mysteries together, and soon they draw in Satoshi and Houtarou's friend, Ibara Mayaka, as well. Mayaka has had a blatant crush on Satoshi since middle school, but he always fends off her advances. Together, they search for the truth in a mystery that involves the history of the Classics Club.
description.ja: 省エネを自分のスタイルとする奉太郎だが、姉の命令で「古典部」に入部することになってしまう。部室を訪れた奉太郎は、そこで好奇心旺盛な少女「千反田える」と出会い「部室密室事件」に遭遇してしまうのだが!?
description.ru: В центре данной истории - литературный клуб в одной школе. Члены этого клуба не просто читают книжки, а пытаются всеми силами раскрыть преступление, которое было совершено 33 года назад. И в этот клуб поступает главный герой по имени Хотаро, хотя поступает он не по собственному желанию, а из-за приказа своей старшей сестры…

title.en: Garbage Brave: Isekai ni Shoukan Sare Suterareta Yuusha no Fukushuu Monogatari

altTitles.en: Garbage Brave: Revenge Story of a Hero Who Has Been Thrown Away After Being Summoned to Another World
Garbage Hero: A Revenge Story of a Hero Who Got Summoned to Another World

altTitles.de: Rache des Müll Helden: Geschichte eines Helden, der in einer anderen Welt beschworen und weggeworfen Wurde

altTitles.ru: Отстойный герой: Месть в ином мире

altTitles.ja: ガベージブレイブ
ガベージブレイブ 異世界に召喚され捨てられた勇者の復讐物語

description.en:
While on a regular school day, Tsukuru along with his classmates got transported to another world.  
  
However, at the other side of the summoning there was a hero's auction, where each nation would bid for the heroes to defeat the demon kings of each territories.  
  
While his classmates received cheat jobs and got auctioned quickly Tsukuru got the useless job "Chef," as no nation bid for him, he got thrown out through a transfer gate. At the other side of the gate was a territory dominated by strong monsters…  
  
As he manages to survive the monster's attacks while nearly dying, Tsukuru goes forward on the path of becoming the strongest!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2248el/)  


---
description.fr:
Un jour d'école normal, Tsukuru et ses camarades de classe sont transportés dans un autre monde.  
  
Ils se retrouvent… au beau milieu d’une vente aux enchères! Alors que ses camarades de classe, encore confus, sont rapidement mis aux enchères, Tsukuru découvre qu"il possède la classe "cuisinier." Aucune nation ne faisant d’offres, il est rapidement jeté dehors par une porte de transfert.  
  
De l'autre côté de cette porte se trouve un territoire dominé par de puissants monstres…  
  
Alors qu'il réussit tout juste à survivre aux attaques d’un monstre, Tsukuru décide d'avancer sur le chemin qui le rendra plus fort!

title.en: Ore wa Subete o “Parry” Suru ~Gyaku Kanchigai no Sekai Saikyou wa Boukensha ni Naritai~

altTitles.ja: 俺は全てを【パリイ】する　～逆勘違いの世界最強は冒険者の夢をみる～

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore ha Subete wo “Parry” Suru ~Gyaku Kanchigai no Sekai Saikyou ha Boukensha ni Naritai~

altTitles.en: I Parry Everything: What Do You Mean I’m the Strongest? I’m Not Even an Adventurer Yet!
I Parry All ~With A Reverse Misunderstanding, The World's Strongest Dreams Of Being An Adventurer~

altTitles.uk: Я "парирую" всё: Сильнейший человек в мире хочет стать авантюристом
Я парировал все время, чтобы стать сильнейшим авантюристом

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đỡ Hết Mọi Thứ: Bạn bảo tôi là người mạnh nhất? Tôi còn chưa được làm mạo hiểm gia đâu đấy!

altTitles.ja: I WILL “PARRY” ALL - The world's strongest man dreams of an adventurer -

description.en:
Ever since he was a young boy, Noor has wanted to be like the adventurers in his father’s stories — dragonslayers, cursebreakers, heroes who always save the day. But as everyone knows, to be an adventurer, you’ve gotta have the right skills! 

Unfortunately for Noor, his [Parry] is bottom-of-the-barrel useless, his prospects are nonexistent, and everybody he knows is telling him to throw in the towel. Faced with this harsh reality, he figures there’s only one thing to do: make up for it with effort! An intense, solitary training regimen ought to do it. If one year won’t cut it, he’ll train for five! If not five, ten! 

Now facing the tail end of his twenties with no new skills to show for his labors, Noor sets out to become an adventurer anyway, determined to try one last time to make his dream come true. He might be clueless when it comes to adventuring, but he’s no stranger to hard work! 

Now, if only he can figure out why everyone keeps looking at him like that...
 
---
 
Original Web Novel: <https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6537fu/>
description.vi:
Kể từ khi còn nhỏ, Noor luôn muốn sắm vai trở thành mạo hiểm gia trong những câu chuyện của cha cậu - dũng sĩ diệt rồng, pháp sư quyền năng, những vị anh hùng luôn dang tay giúp đỡ những người yếu thế. Nhưng để trở thành một mạo hiểm gia thực thụ là cả một quá trình đổ mồ hôi sôi nước mắt.

Không may cho Noor, chiêu [Đỡ] của cậu lại phế toàn tập, thất bại nối tiếp thất bại, mọi người ai ai cũng khuyên cậu từ bỏ. Đối mặt với thực tại tàn khốc này, Noor biết chỉ còn một cách duy nhất để khẳng định bản thân: Chính là luyện tập thật khắc nghiệt! Một khóa huấn luyện đơn độc, khốc liệt chắc chắn sẽ hiệu quả. Nếu một năm không thành, thì phải luyện thêm năm năm. Nếu năm năm vẫn không thạo, phải tập thêm mười năm!

Hai mươi cái xuân xanh sắp trôi qua, trong khi bạn bè đồng trang lứa đã thành đạt, mình cậu vẫn giậm chân tại chỗ. Tuy vậy, giấc mơ trở thành mạo hiểm gia trong cậu vẫn rực cháy, Noor quyết tâm một lần cuối cùng để thực hiện khát khao đó. Dẫu không hiểu rõ việc phiêu lưu nghĩa là gì, nhưng cần cù bù siêng năng, chỉ cần cố gắng là được!

Hãy cùng theo dõi bước chân từ chàng mạo hiểm gia trẻ tuổi trở thành người mạnh nhất lục địa...
description.pt-br: Desde que era um menino, Noor queria ser como os aventureiros das histórias de seu pai — matadores de dragões, quebradores de maldições, heróis que sempre salvam o dia. Mas, como todos sabem, para ser um aventureiro, é preciso ter as habilidades certas!Infelizmente para Noor, sua [Parry] é completamente inútil, suas perspectivas são inexistentes, e todos que ele conhece estão dizendo para ele desistir. Diante dessa dura realidade, ele percebe que só há uma coisa a fazer: compensar isso com esforço! Um intenso regime de treinamento solitário deve resolver. Se um ano não for suficiente, ele treinará por cinco! Se não forem cinco, dez!Agora, ao final dos seus vinte e poucos anos, sem novas habilidades para mostrar pelo seu trabalho árduo, Noor decide se tornar um aventureiro mesmo assim, determinado a tentar uma última vez para realizar seu sonho. Ele pode não saber nada sobre aventuras, mas não é estranho ao trabalho duro! Agora, se ele apenas conseguir descobrir por que todos continuam olhando para ele daquele jeito..

title.en: One Day a Message Window Appeared Out of Nowhere!?

altTitles.ja: ある日突然メッセージウィンドウが表示されたんですけど！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru Hi Totsuzen Message Window ga Hyoujisaretan desu kedo!?
Aru Hi Totsuzen Messeeji Windou ga Hyoujisaretandesukedo!?

description.en:
The protagonist, a university student named Kazuya Hayakawa woke up one day with a message window that shows up in his field of view. This window is always visible to him, and when certain lines are displayed in it, he gets thrown into confusion.

From that day onward began Hayakawa's daily ordeal of getting manipulated by this message window.

(Source: Amazon JP)
description.ja:
主人公・早川一哉はある日目が覚めるとメッセージウィンドウが見えるようになってしまった。
常に表示されるそのウィンドウにはとあるセリフが表示され主人公を混乱させる。

この日から早川一哉のメッセージウィンドウに振り回される苦難の日々が始まった。

altTitles.ja: トーマの心臓

description.en:
As winter draws to a close, German boarding school student Thomas Werner dies one morning. He leaves behind a single letter addressed to his fellow student Juli that reads "Here is my love. Here is the sound of my heart."  
  
With his faith shaken to the core by the words, the scholarly Juli sinks to the depths of despair. His cynical roommate Oscar finds himself watching over Juli's fragile mental state while keeping his own feelings for Juli under wraps. Then new student Eric enters the school - and he has an uncanny resemblance to the deceased Thomas…  
  
Enter the world of a boy's boarding school in Germany where all will be revealed about the suffering and redemption that comes with love. Even today, this early work of Hagio Moto is still regarded as a brilliant masterpiece.  
  
This is volumes 11-12 of Hagio Moto Works  
  
1 Bianka (ビアンカ)  
2 Tou no Aru Ie (塔のある家)  
3 Cake Cake Cake (ケーキケーキケーキ)  
4 Sara Hill no Seiya (セーラ・ヒルの聖夜)  
5 Sangatsu Usagi ga Shuudande (３月ウサギが集団で)  
6 Poe no Ichizoku 1 (ポーの一族　　　１)  
7 Poe no Ichizoku 2 (ポーの一族　　　２)  
8 Poe no Ichizoku 3 (ポーの一族　　　３)  
9 Poe no Ichizoku 4 (ポーの一族　　　４)  
10 Kyobetsu Hata no Isansouzokunin (キャベツ畑の遺産相続人)  
11 Thomas no Shinzou First (トーマの心臓　上)  
12 Thomas no Shinzou Last (トーマの心臓　下)  
13 Juuichinin Iru! (１１人いる！)  
14 Shiiro no Yuukyuu / Kuro no Eien (東の地平・西の永久)  
15 Kono Musume Urimasu! (この娘うります！)  
16 Tottemo Shiawase Moto-chan (とってもしあわせモトちゃん)  
17 American Pie (アメリカンパイ)

altTitles.ja: 貧乏貴族ノードの冒険譚 Nord's Adventure

description.en: Nord is the third son of a poor noble family. To support his family, he decides to give up his career as a knight and become an adventurer to make money right away. However, it is not so easy to solve the calamity that surrounds his large family!
description.ja: 貧乏貴族の三男として生まれた少年、ノード。家族の食い扶持のため、騎士としての道を諦めすぐにでも稼げる冒険者になることを決意する。しかし、大家族を取り巻く災難を解決するのは、そう簡単じゃない――！

altTitles.ja: ミクシム・イレブン

description.en: Matsuri Ichimatsu, Haruno Koume, and Sanguubashi Takezou are old friends with one thing in common: despite their good looks, they're incredibly unpopular with the ladies. But what does Polaris have to do with their fate? And will they ever get that harem they've always wanted?

title.en: Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

altTitles.ja: 舞妓さんちのまかないさん

altTitles.en: The Caterer at the Maiko Manor
The Makanai: Cooking for the Maiko House

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

description.en: All we have left to do is eat.

altTitles.ja: ゴーアンゴー

description.en: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.en: So Cold That It's Blue, and Cunning Enough to Be Red

altTitles.es-la: Tan frío como el azul y tan agresivo como el rojo

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！
description.pt-br: Tokimori-san é uma mulher linda e bem-sucedida. Mas quando ela está fora do trabalho, ela tende a ficar um pouco distraída! Viver junto com a charmosa Tokimori-san sempre me deixa nervoso!

altTitles.fr: Le Nectar de la Malédiction Divine

altTitles.ja: 神呪のネクタール

altTitles.th: ศึกน้ำทิพย์แห่งมนตรา

description.en: Sakura, the last surviving princess of a fallen kingdom, is being hunted down for the power of Ambrosia she possesses - the ability to grant divine strength, but only to a human. With no human companion, she decides to summon one from another world in a desperate attempt to find a knight to protect her, but the man who answers her call is less than what she had hoped for.
description.pt-br: Sakura, a última princesa de um reino caído está sendo caçada devido ao poder de ambrosia que possui- habilidade a qual concede força divina, mas apenas aos humanos. Sem nenhum companheiro humano enquanto fugia, ela se viu obrigada a invocar desesperadamente um cavaleiro de outro mundo para se proteger, mas o homem que ela acaba invocando aparenta ser muito menos do que ela gostaria do que fosse. Conseguirá Sakura se proteger?

altTitles.ja: Bad∞End∞Night～インセイン・パーティー～

description.en: Hatsune Miku is a young woman seeking to become an actress, but just as it seems her chance has come, everything is thrown upside down when she finds herself hurled into the “world of stage” within a strange mansion. There she meets seven mysterious, and potentially dangerous, characters. Although each comes with their own secrets, they almost all have one goal in common—find the stolen script pages, or be trapped in this false world forever!

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

altTitles.ja-ro: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara ja Nai

description.en: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

description.en: In the dismal world where humans live together with hybrids everything becomes more distorted day by day. Yvas is a teenager who happens to work as an assassin for an agency established by the government. However, after an incident between them and his friend, Yvas and his partner Alissa swear to destroy the agency and become free from it. Everything becomes even more complicated when Yvas dies and comes back to life with a strange power called ""awakening"". Due to circumstances Yvas becomes a target of multiple underground groups.
description.fr: Dans un monde lugubre où les humains cohabitent avec les hybrides, tout devient de plus en plus déformé chaque jour. Yvas est un jeune qui se retrouve à travailler comme assassin pour une agence établie par le gouvernement pour exterminer les gangs de rue. Cependant, après un incident entre eux et ses amis, Yvas et sa partenaire Alissa jurent de détruire l’agence et de s’en libérer.
description.es-la: En el sombrío mundo en el que los humanos comparten su existencia con híbridos, la distorsión crece día a día. Yvas, un adolescente, se ve obligado a desempeñar el papel de asesino para una agencia respaldada por el gobierno. Sin embargo, tras un incidente con un amigo, Yvas y su compañera Alissa juran destruir la agencia y liberarse de sus ataduras. La situación se complica cuando Yvas muere y resucita con un extraño poder denominado "despertar". Debido a circunstancias particulares, Yvas se convierte en blanco de múltiples grupos clandestinos.

description.en: A story about a girl that's friends with nature. Will she be strong enough to face her life that's full of difficulties? Or will she need nature's help?
description.id: Kisah seorang gadis yang berteman dengan sosok Alam. Apakah ia cukup kuat untuk menghadapi kehidupannya yang penuh dengan kemalangan? Ataukah ia akan memerlukan bantuan Sang Alam?

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

altTitles.ja: タプリスシュガーステップ

description.en:
A heartwarming everyday comedy about the trio of first-year students: Tapris, an earnest and pure angel who doesn't seem to be Gabriel's junior, Shinohara-san, a human who loves cute things, and Mei, a demon whose thinking is hard to understand.  
Whether it's the excitement of a first time experience, the excitement of a new friend, or playing with the Gabriel whom she looks up to, Tapris is busy every day!​  


---
description.ru:
Трогательная повседневная комедия о трех первогодках старшей школы: Таприс, искреннем и чистом ангеле, который, кажется, не младше Габриэль, Синохаре-сан, человеке, который любит милые вещи, и Мэй, демоне, чье мышление трудно понять.  
Будь то волнение от первого опыта, волнение от нового друга или игра с Габриэль, на которую она смотрит снизу вверх, Таприс занята каждый день!​

description.en: Ge ge's name is You Tiao, Di di's name is Soya. A cute comedy series about their daily lives!

title.en: It’s Time to Change the Genre

altTitles.ja: ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！

altTitles.en: I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre

description.en:
I woke up inside my favorite novel. 

Not as the protagonist, Luca Winterwald, but as Judith, his abusive aunt and the first character to die — time for a rewrite! 

I’ll hand Luca off to his loving, long-lost uncle as scripted, and then live my own life far from danger. At least, that was the plan. When his uncle arrives, Luca suddenly calls out, “Don’t leave!” 

Now, I must protect Luca from impending family tragedy, raise him to become the hero, and turn this villainess’s ending upside down!

description.en: After training for 11 years to reach superhuman status, I gave up on my dream and returned to the family farm. But suddenly, Hawa appeared! She’s a powerful farming spirit who can make anything grow—even produce that enhances people’s powers. Now I’ve got my superhuman ID card, more spirits-friends, mouthwatering Grade A+ crops, and quests! Will Hawa and her friends lead us all to fame and fortune and change our lives forever?
description.ja:
超人たちがあらゆる分野で活躍する世界。 金村健吾は、モンスターを倒す超人になろうと小さい頃から訓練を積んでいたが挫折。 その間に弟の金村慎吾が保証人になって姿をくらまし、兄は超人になる夢を諦め帰農した。 しかし、そこで農業の精霊ハワと出会うのだが…！

11년 동안 초인이 되기 위해서 노력했지만 결국 일반인으로 끝난 이건우.

Обычный среднестатистический гражданин Кореи, отчаянно пытавшийся стать героем на протяжении 11 лет, осознал, что это не его ремесло и не его мечтания. Бросив все, Ли Ген Ву решил стать фермером и жить своей тихой жизнью. Но все ли так просто?

description.th:
'อีกอนอู' ชาวสวนวัย 30 ปี ใฝ่ฝันอยากเป็นยอดมนุษย์มาตั้งแต่เด็ก
แต่เขาก็ล้มเลิกความฝันนั้น และกลับมาใช้ชีวิตเป็นชาวสวนในชนบทกับครอบครัว
ทว่า เรื่องที่ไม่คาดคิดก็เกิดขึ้น ด้วยความเพียรพยายามในงานสวน ทำให้พลังที่ซ่อนไว้ถูกปลุกขึ้นมา
พร้อมกับภูตน้อย 'ฮาวา' ที่เป็นวิญญาณการเกษตรผู้คอยรับใช้กอนอู และเรื่องราววุ่นๆ ในสวนของพวกเขาก็เริ่มต้นขึ้น

description.pt-br: Um cidadão coreano medíocre que esteve desesperadamente tentando ser um herói por 11 anos, finalmente percebeu que essa nunca foi sua vocação ou sonho. Depois de desistir de tudo, Lee Kun Woo decidiu se tornar um fazendeiro e viver uma vida pacífica. Mas, isto é simples assim?

altTitles.ja: 助け屋SHIBETA
助屋SHIBETA

description.en: <http://tasukeyashibeta.blog.fc2.com/>

altTitles.ja: 裏世界ピクニック

description.en: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
description.ja: ネット上で実話怪談として語られる存在が出現する、この現実と隣り合わせで謎だらけの<裏世界>。研究とお金稼ぎ、そして大切な人を捜すため、鳥子と空魚は非日常へと足を踏み入れる。女子ふたり怪異探検サバイバル!!
description.ru: Сюжет разворачивается в современном мире, но в нем существуют двери, которые пропускают людей "на другую сторону", где оживают городские легенды и странные истории из Интернета. Студентка колледжа Сораво Камикоши находит одну из таких дверей и идет исследовать Потусторонье. Она почти погибает, когда ее спасает Торико Нишина. Торико - загадочная девушка, которая умело обращается с ружьем и кого-то ищет в Потусторонье. Вместе они начинают исследовать мир за дверями.

altTitles.zh: 成为颓废文男主的妈妈

description.en: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?

description.en:
First official comic anthology for the much-discussed Adachi to Shimamura!  
  
Iruma Hitoma's popular novel series Adachi to Shimamura now in comic anthology form!
